channel.title: Double XP live! Join now
channel.description:
[center]StewieScape! 317
Double XP IS NOW ACTIVE FOR THE WEEKEND TO CELEBRATE THE OPENING OF THE SERVER!!
Its a new server so we will need staff!!
Join the forums: www.stewiescape.co.nr
Webclient: www.stewiescape.co.nr/webclient.html
Client Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?5z6u96c964vbbm7
RuneScape Private Server's are meant to be fun, thats why we have created StewieScape. StewieScape is packed with content from mini-games to pk'ing and every skill with good fast paced XP rates with easy to obtain items you wouldn't usually of gotten on RS. Check the features below!
Features:
All Skills are all fully working and trainable: (Including Dungeoneering. Summoning, Construction and Hunter!!)
Attack Strength Defence Range Prayer Magic Runecrafting Construction Dungeoneering- Max Level 120!!! Agility Herblore Thieving Crafting Fletching Slayer Hunter!!! Mining Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking Woodcutting Farming Summoning!!
Mini-games:
Duel Arena Barrows Pest Control Tzhaar Warriors Guild Assault Recipe for disaster Normad Angry Goblin Castle Wars (Beta) Dominion Tower
PK'ing: With pk points: FunPK Varrock GraveYard Edgeville Green Dragons
Bosses:
NEX! King Black Dragon Dagannoth Kings Tormented Demons Corporal Beast Forgotten Warrior Mad Mummy Barrel Chest Godwars
Loyalty System:
Every hour you play on the server you will gain 100 loyalty Points, these can be used to buy:
Rares Titles Pets Auras
Squeal Of Fortune! (SoF):
For every 99 Skill you gain, we give you 3 spins on the SoF and 10M cash!
Skillcape emotes:
We have full working Skillcape emotes, Including the Completionist Cape!
StewieScape Points:
StewieScape points are points in which you obtain by doing mini-games, pk'ing and dueling, these points can be spent at the points shop where you can buy items such as godswords and other cool weapons and armour!
Other Features:
Working Clan Chat Lottery Optional full screen client All weapon special attacks.
AND MORE!
Join today!!![/center]
This was copied from the page at runelocus - Im not the owner of this server.
